name: Eternal Champions: Special Edition
overview: Eternal Champions: Special Edition is a gameplay overhaul of the 1993 original. Features Include: • A Rebalanced Inner Strength System (Optional patch for unlimited Inner Strength) • Lower difficulty for Contest mode • Easier overkills on ALL stages • Revamped hitstun to allow for more stylish combos (Works on CPU! - v2.2 and up) • A few character tweaks to better balance the roster
